Package com.lmax.solana4j.programs

Class AssociatedTokenProgram

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.lmax.solana4j.programs.AssociatedTokenProgram
  • public final class AssociatedTokenProgram
extends java.lang.Object
    Program for managing associated token accounts on the Solana blockchain.

    • Field Detail

      • ASSOCIATED_TOKEN_PROGRAM_ACCOUNT

        public static final PublicKey ASSOCIATED_TOKEN_PROGRAM_ACCOUNT
        The public key for the associated token program account.

        This constant defines the public key associated with the Solana account for the associated token program. It is set to the value returned by Solana.account(byte[]) using the ASSOCIATED_TOKEN_PROGRAM_ID.

      • CREATE_INSTRUCTION

        public static final int CREATE_INSTRUCTION
        The instruction code for creating an account.

        This constant defines the instruction code used to create a new account in Solana.

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • IDEMPOTENT_CREATE_INSTRUCTION

        public static final int IDEMPOTENT_CREATE_INSTRUCTION
        The instruction code for creating an account idempotently.

        This constant defines the instruction code used to create a new account in Solana idempotently, ensuring that if the creation is attempted multiple times, it will have the same effect as if it were done once.

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • factory

        public static AssociatedTokenProgram.AssociatedTokenProgramFactory factory​(TransactionBuilder tb)
        Factory method for creating a new instance of AssociatedTokenProgramFactory.
        Parameters:
        tb - the transaction builder
        Returns:
        a new instance of AssociatedTokenProgramFactory

      • createAssociatedTokenAccount

        public static TransactionInstruction createAssociatedTokenAccount​(ProgramDerivedAddress programDerivedAddress,
                                                                  PublicKey mint,
                                                                  PublicKey owner,
                                                                  PublicKey payer,
                                                                  PublicKey programId,
                                                                  boolean idempotent)
        Creates a new associated token account.
        Parameters:
        programDerivedAddress - the program derived address
        mint - the public key of the mint
        owner - the public key of the owner
        payer - the public key of the payer
        programId - the public key of the token program used to create the programDerivedAddress
        idempotent - whether the creation should be idempotent
        Returns:
        A TransactionInstruction of the created instruction

      • deriveAddress

        public static ProgramDerivedAddress deriveAddress​(PublicKey owner,
                                                  PublicKey tokenProgramAccount,
                                                  PublicKey mint)
        Derives a program address for a given owner, token program account, and mint. This method generates a program-derived address based on the combination of the owner's public key, the token program account's public key, and the mint's public key, using the associated token program account.
        Parameters:
        owner - the owner's public key; must not be null
        tokenProgramAccount - the token program account's public key; must not be null
        mint - the mint's public key; must not be null
        Returns:
        the derived program address based on the provided owner, token program account, and mint public keys
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if the owner, tokenProgramAccount, or mint is null
